Flow.description: BODEV-4533 Tracing New Pricing Deals Updated the flow to set "Opportunity with value-based pricing" to No if Enterprise pricing products are removed.

formulas.name: AssignAccountSubsidiary
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Account.Subsidiary_lookup__r.Name} = "Bynder B.V.", "Bynder B.V.", IF({!$Record.Account.Subsidiary_lookup__r.Name} = "Bynder LLC", "Bynder LLC", IF({!$Record.Account.Subsidiary_lookup__r.Name} = "Bynder Ltd", "Bynder Ltd", IF({!$Record.Account.Subsidiary_lookup__r.Name} = "Bynder Pty Ltd", "Bynder Pty Ltd",NULL))))

formulas.name: AssignSubsidiary
formulas.expression: IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Sales_Office__c},"Amsterdam"), "Bynder B.V.", IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Sales_Office__c},"London"), "Bynder Ltd", IF(OR(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Sales_Office__c},"San Carlos"),ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Sales_Office__c},"Boston"),ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Sales_Office__c},"San Mateo")), "Bynder LLC", IF(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Sales_Office__c},"Melbourne"), "Bynder Pty Ltd", NULL))))

formulas.name: frmMRRMovement
formulas.expression: AND( OR( NOT(ISBLANK({!$Record.QA_Completed_Timestamp__c})), CONTAINS(TEXT({!$Record.StageName}), "Closed")), OR( AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Renewal__c}), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE({!$Record.Renewal__c})))), AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Churn__c}), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE({!$Record.Churn__c})))), AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Expansion__c}), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE({!$Record.Expansion__c})))), AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Contraction__c}), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE({!$Record.Contraction__c})))), AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.New_MRR__c}), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE({!$Record.New_MRR__c})))), AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Internal_Transfer__c}), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE({!$Record.Internal_Transfer__c})))), AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Churn_Platform_churn__c}), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE({!$Record.Churn_Platform_churn__c})))), AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.New_MRR_Platform_transfer__c}), NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE({!$Record.New_MRR_Platform_transfer__c})))) ) )

formulas.name: frmOtherFinanceFieldsChanged
formulas.expression: AND( OR( NOT(ISBLANK({!$Record.QA_Completed_Timestamp__c})), CONTAINS(TEXT({!$Record.StageName}), "Closed")), OR( AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.CloseDate}), NOT(ISCHANGED({!$Record.QA_Completed_Timestamp__c})), PRIORVALUE({!$Record.CloseDate}) < TODAY()), AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.CloseDate}), PRIORVALUE({!$Record.CloseDate}) < {!$Record.CloseDate}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.End_date_contract__c}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.Startdate_contract__c}), AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.MRR_from_Products__c}), PRIORVALUE({!$Record.MRR_from_Products__c}) <> {!$Record.MRR_from_Products__c}) ) )

formulas.name: frmSETRECORDTYPE
formulas.expression: IF( TEXT({!$Record.Type}) = "New Business-Enterprise Cloud", "0120P000000QxSt", IF( TEXT({!$Record.Type}) = "New Business - Expansion Portal", "0120P000000QxSt", IF( TEXT({!$Record.Type}) = "Existing Business-Renewal", "0120P000000QxSy", IF( TEXT({!$Record.Type}) = "Existing Business-Upsell", "0120P000000QxT3", IF( TEXT({!$Record.Type}) = "Existing Business - Internal Transfer", "0120P000000QxT3", IF( TEXT({!$Record.Type}) = "Existing Business-Professional Services", "0120P000000R2w1", IF( TEXT({!$Record.Type}) = "Existing Business - Platform Transfer", "0120P000000QxSt", IF( TEXT({!$Record.Type}) = "Referral", "0123g000000bpTw", {!$Record.RecordTypeId} ))))))))

Flow.label: Opportunity [BSF] Handler
